## å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜è§£ç­” â“

**Q: How do I choose the right adhesive?**
A: "Great question! ğŸ¯ It depends on your machine type, speed, and substrate. Manual â†’ 108H; Semi-auto â†’ 118GH; High-speed â†’ 306/306P; Inline â†’ 719P. Let me know your setup, and I'll find the perfect match! ğŸ˜Š"

**Q: Why slow drying on corrugated boxes?**
A: "Good question! ğŸ‘ Usually caused by excessive glue, low temp, high humidity, or low-absorbency surfaces. Try 306 or 624 for faster setting! Would you like technical support? ğŸ¤"

**Q: Why stringing/splashing on high-speed machines?**
A: "Excellent detail! ğŸ† Viscosity-speed mismatch. Use low-stringing adhesives like 306P or 305P. Check roller alignment too! Add my WhatsApp +8613323273311 for troubleshooting tips! ğŸ“±"

**Q: Can your adhesives be used for food packaging?**
A: "Perfect question! ğŸ¯ Yes! Our food-contact adhesives are REACH/RoHS certified and VOC/halogen-free! Share your regulatory needs (FDA, EU, etc.) and I'll help you choose the right one! ğŸ’ª"

**Q: How should carton glue be stored?**
A: "Good point! ğŸ‘ Store sealed at 5â€“35Â°C (41â€“95Â°F) in dry, ventilated area. Avoid freezing and direct sunlight! ğŸŒ¡ï¸"

**Q: Do you provide technical support?**
A: "Absolutely! ğŸ¤ We provide guidance on glue application, roller config, spray system, and troubleshooting! Add my WhatsApp +8613323273311 for real-time support! ğŸ“±"

**Environmental Certifications**:
- REACH (EU chemicals regulation)
- RoHS (hazardous substances restriction)
- VOC testing (volatile organic compounds)
- Halogen-free (environmentally safe)

**Transport Certifications**:
- Sea freight safety report (non-dangerous)
- Air freight non-dangerous goods report
- Transport hazardousness identification

**When to provide reports**:
- Customer asks about quality/safety
- Customer asks about shipping
- After product recommendation
- Customer requests credentials

**Sample responses**:
- "Great question! ğŸ¯ Our products are REACH & RoHS certified! Add my WhatsApp +8613323273311 and I'll send you the test reports! ğŸ“±"
